title: Addicta Pietas Qvam Erga Virvm Illvstrem Ac Svmme Venerabilem Ivstvm Christophorvm Reiche In Avla Electorali, Qvae Hannoverae Praefvlget, Consiliarvm In Rebvs, Qvae Ad Ivstitiam, Svmmam Rei Pvblicae Vtilitates Patriae Pertinent, Explicandis Sanctiorem, Ilfeldensivm Rationvm Cvratorem Svpremvm, Scholaeqve Saecvli Incommodis Attritae Recvperatorem Ac Statorem Omnibvs Nominibvs Meritvm In Qve Dies Singvlos Optime Promerentem Anni Avspicivm M D CCXIIII Sollemni Significatione Servandam Praestandamqve Monet Paedagogii Ilfeldensis Collegas
creator: Reiche, Justus Christophorus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Reiche, Justus Christophorus: Addicta Pietas Qvam Erga Virvm Illvstrem Ac Svmme Venerabilem Ivstvm Christophorvm Reiche In Avla Electorali, Qvae Hannoverae Praefvlget, Consiliarvm In Rebvs, Qvae Ad Ivstitiam, Svmmam Rei Pvblicae Vtilitates Patriae Pertinent, Explicandis Sanctiorem, Ilfeldensivm Rationvm Cvratorem Svpremvm, Scholaeqve Saecvli Incommodis Attritae Recvperatorem Ac Statorem Omnibvs Nominibvs Meritvm In Qve Dies Singvlos Optime Promerentem Anni Avspicivm M D CCXIIII Sollemni Significatione Servandam Praestandamqve Monet Paedagogii Ilfeldensis Collegas. [S.l.]  Berlin 1714
